languages.text: "Душа Иремерисс. Архонта Опустошительной бури. Она должна принадлежать мне. Я не знаю, где... я не знаю, как... но эта дрянь, пытавшаяся избавиться от меня чужими руками, должна расстаться с жизнью, а ее душа — оказаться в моей душеловке". {n}Маражай небрежно кивает на темный кристалл, свисающий у него с пояса.{/n}

"The soul of Yremeryss, the Archon of the Reaving Tempest. It should belong to me. I do not know where... I do not know how... but that bitch tried to dispatch me without sullying her own hands and she deserves to lose her life. Her soul will remain in my Soul-Trap." {n}With a lazy nod, Marazhai indicates the dark crystal hanging from his belt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Душа Иремерисс. Архонта Опустошительной бури. Она должна принадлежать мне. Я не знаю, где... я не знаю, как... но эта дрянь, пытавшаяся избавиться от меня чужими руками, должна расстаться с жизнью, а ее душа — оказаться в моей душеловке". {n}Маражай небрежно кивает на темный кристалл, свисающий у него с пояса.{/n}

Her soul will remain in my Soul-Trap." {n}With a lazy nod, Marazhai indicates the dark crystal hanging from his belt.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我打算杀了狂风阴谋团的执政官伊芮梅莉斯，夺走她的灵魂。我不知道是怎么回事……也不知道她是怎么做的……但那个臭婊子，居然打算不弄脏自己的手就把我除掉，她必须为此付出生命的代价。她的灵魂将会永远困在我的灵魂陷阱里。”{n}玛拉斋懒洋洋地点了点头，指了指挂在腰带上的黑水晶。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The soul of Yremeryss, the Archon of the Reaving Tempest. It should belong to me. I do not know where... I do not know how... but that bitch tried to dispatch me without sullying her own hands and she deserves to lose her life. Her soul will remain in my Soul-Trap." {n}With a lazy nod, Marazhai indicates the dark crystal hanging from his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我打算杀了狂风阴谋团的执政官伊芮梅莉斯，夺走她的灵魂。我不知道是怎么回事……也不知道她是怎么做的……但那个臭婊子，居然打算不弄脏自己的手就把我除掉，她必须为此付出生命的代价。她的灵魂将会永远困在我的灵魂陷阱里。”{n}玛拉斋懒洋洋地点了点头，指了指挂在腰带上的黑水晶。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「略奪の嵐のアーコン、イレメリスの魂だ。アレは俺の手元になければならない。居場所…それに手に入れる方法もわからない…だが、あの女は己の手を汚さず俺をチャチャっと始末しようとした。死ぬのは当然の報いだ。奴の魂は俺の魂の器に留めておいてやろう」{n}気だるそうに頷きながら、マラズハイはベルトにぶら下がっているダーククリスタルを指した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The soul of Yremeryss, the Archon of the Reaving Tempest. It should belong to me. I do not know where... I do not know how... but that bitch tried to dispatch me without sullying her own hands and she deserves to lose her life. Her soul will remain in my Soul-Trap." {n}With a lazy nod, Marazhai indicates the dark crystal hanging from his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「略奪の嵐のアーコン、イレメリスの魂だ。アレは俺の手元になければならない。居場所…それに手に入れる方法もわからない…だが、あの女は己の手を汚さず俺をチャチャっと始末しようとした。死ぬのは当然の報いだ。奴の魂は俺の魂の器に留めておいてやろう」{n}気だるそうに頷きながら、マラズハイはベルトにぶら下がっているダーククリスタルを指した。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «El alma de Yremeryss, arconte de la Tempestad Asoladora. Debería ser mía. Ignoro dónde... y no sé cómo... pero esa perra intentó liquidarme sin ensuciarse ella misma las manos, y merece perder la vida. Su alma será presa de mi trampa de almas». {n}Con un perezoso ademán de la cabeza, Marazhai señala el cristal oscuro que cuelga de su cinto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The soul of Yremeryss, the Archon of the Reaving Tempest. It should belong to me. I do not know where... I do not know how... but that bitch tried to dispatch me without sullying her own hands and she deserves to lose her life. Her soul will remain in my Soul-Trap." {n}With a lazy nod, Marazhai indicates the dark crystal hanging from his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El alma de Yremeryss, arconte de la Tempestad Asoladora. Debería ser mía. Ignoro dónde... y no sé cómo... pero esa perra intentó liquidarme sin ensuciarse ella misma las manos, y merece perder la vida. Su alma será presa de mi trampa de almas». {n}Con un perezoso ademán de la cabeza, Marazhai señala el cristal oscuro que cuelga de su cinto.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « L'âme d'Yremeryss, archonte de la Tempête ravageuse. Elle me revient de droit. Je ne sais pas où ni comment je lui mettrai la main dessus, mais cette chienne a essayé de m'éliminer sans se salir les mains et elle mérite de mourir. Son âme sera à jamais prisonnière de mon piège. » {n}D'un hochement de tête nonchalant, Marazhai désigne le cristal noir accroché à sa ceinture.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The soul of Yremeryss, the Archon of the Reaving Tempest. It should belong to me. I do not know where... I do not know how... but that bitch tried to dispatch me without sullying her own hands and she deserves to lose her life. Her soul will remain in my Soul-Trap." {n}With a lazy nod, Marazhai indicates the dark crystal hanging from his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « L'âme d'Yremeryss, archonte de la Tempête ravageuse. Elle me revient de droit. Je ne sais pas où ni comment je lui mettrai la main dessus, mais cette chienne a essayé de m'éliminer sans se salir les mains et elle mérite de mourir. Son âme sera à jamais prisonnière de mon piège. » {n}D'un hochement de tête nonchalant, Marazhai désigne le cristal noir accroché à sa ceinture.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Die Seele von Yremeryss, der Archontin des plündernden Sturms. Sie sollte mir gehören. Ich weiß nicht wo ... Ich weiß nicht wie ... aber dieses Miststück wollte mich erledigen, ohne sich die Hände schmutzig zu machen. Sie hat es verdient, ihr Leben zu verlieren. Ich werde ihre Seele in meiner Seelenfalle gefangen halten." {n}Mit einem kurzen Nicken deutet Marazhai auf den dunklen Kristall an seinem Gürtel.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The soul of Yremeryss, the Archon of the Reaving Tempest. It should belong to me. I do not know where... I do not know how... but that bitch tried to dispatch me without sullying her own hands and she deserves to lose her life. Her soul will remain in my Soul-Trap." {n}With a lazy nod, Marazhai indicates the dark crystal hanging from his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Die Seele von Yremeryss, der Archontin des plündernden Sturms. Sie sollte mir gehören. Ich weiß nicht wo ... Ich weiß nicht wie ... aber dieses Miststück wollte mich erledigen, ohne sich die Hände schmutzig zu machen. Sie hat es verdient, ihr Leben zu verlieren. Ich werde ihre Seele in meiner Seelenfalle gefangen halten." {n}Mit einem kurzen Nicken deutet Marazhai auf den dunklen Kristall an seinem Gürtel.{/n}

languages.original_text: "The soul of Yremeryss, the Archon of the Reaving Tempest. It should belong to me. I do not know where... I do not know how... but that bitch tried to dispatch me without sullying her own hands and she deserves to lose her life. Her soul will remain in my Soul-Trap." {n}With a lazy nod, Marazhai indicates the dark crystal hanging from his belt.{/n}

languages.text: "Müfteris Kasırga Arkonu Yremeryss'in ruhu benim olmalı. Nerede olduğunu... Nasıl olacağını bilmiyorum ama... O kaltak, elini kirletmeden benden kurtulmaya çalıştı. Bunun karşılığında hayatından olmayı hak ediyor. Ruhu, benim Ruh Tuzağımda kalmalı." {n}Marazhai, miskince başını eğerek kemerinden sarkan koyu kristali işaret ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The soul of Yremeryss, the Archon of the Reaving Tempest. It should belong to me. I do not know where... I do not know how... but that bitch tried to dispatch me without sullying her own hands and she deserves to lose her life. Her soul will remain in my Soul-Trap." {n}With a lazy nod, Marazhai indicates the dark crystal hanging from his belt.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Müfteris Kasırga Arkon'u Yremeryss'in ruhu benim olmalı. Nerede olduğunu... Nasıl olacağını bilmiyorum ama... O kaltak, elini pisliğe bulamadan benden kurtulmaya çalıştı. Bunun karşılığında hayatından olmayı hak ediyor. Ruhu, benim Ruh Tuzağımda kalmalı." {n}Marazhai, miskin bir şekilde başını eğerek kemerinden sarkan koyu kristali işaret ediyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
